description:
Women Helping Women to Succeed!  Key Skills for an Empowered and Satisfying Life

By women and for women, this course pulls together lectures to help you:

  • Boost your confidence and self-esteem so you start with a foundation for success
  • Learn leadership skills to implement in the workplace, at home or in your own business.
  • Take care of yourself in the midst of taking care of so many others
  • Develop hands-on business skills if you're engaged in your own business or others
  • Learn social media and web development insights.
  • Take up a new hobby.

This course demonstrates how vibrant, passionate women from across the globe can collaborate and produce an informative online training program to inspire and empower other women.

We've developed over 50 courses individually and we're excited to bring some of that expertise and knowledge to other women in this free course.

Check out our bios to see the range and depth of knowledge of your 5-star instructors.

We also invite you to join our women's only Facebook group, "Women Helping Women to Succeed."

This course celebrates our commonalities, diversity and strengths, it taps into our areas of expertise and aims to give you a taste of what's possible both as individuals and as a team.
title: Women Helping Women to Succeed
instructors: Denise Fletcher, Kristen Palana, Lisa Cain, PhD, Deborah Wojcicki, Kellie Edwards, Jacqueline Seidel, Leap  Training Institute, Snehal Wagh, Majo Jacinto, Barrett Clemmensen Powell, Teresa L Greenway, Anneke Camstra, Angelika Davey, Jacqui Malpass, Sarah Simpson, Sharon Ramel, Mary Cummings
